title: A curious and diverse flora. Part 2. An Isolated but related flora
creator_credit: Tony Chenn, Nicholas Alexander, Australian Academy of Science and CSIRO
brief_description: Examines the flora of the south-west corner of Western Australia, where of the 4000 species to be found, more than three-quarters are endemic to the area. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
